item.content:encoded:
[gdlr_heading tag="h2" size="30px" font_weight="bold"]Skills & Progress Bar[/gdlr_heading] [gdlr_space height="40px"]
[gdlr_heading tag="h3" size="22px" font_weight="normal"]Small Style[/gdlr_heading]
[gdlr_space height="30px"]

item.title: Custom Skin
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Custom Skin

You can create various skin to use on color/parallax section easily. This will help you to be able to create various color tone within your site.

item.title: Sidebar Size Customizable
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Sidebar Size Customizable

You can set the width of sidebar easily via admin panel. We have 5 options for you. 16%, 25%, 33%, 41%, 50%. And 25%, 33% for both sidebar layout.

item.title: Font Awesome
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Font Awesome

Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized — size, color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done with the power of CSS.You can call it easily by shortcode. http://themes.goodlayers2.com/mediso/corporate/icons-icon-boxes/

item.title: Shortcode Generator
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Shortcode Generator

You don't need to remember all shortcodes anymore. You can easily call it by the button in VS editor.

item.title: Font Uploader
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Font Uploader

You can upload font directly via admin panel.(FontFace)

item.title: Unlimited Sidebar
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Unlimited Sidebar

Create unlimited sidebar just right in appearance > widget. You can also assign your sidebar to any posts/pages.

item.title: Google Font
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Google Font

The most famous font today, Google font, is also available in this theme as well.

item.title: Post Format
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Post Format

You can use post format feature from WP in this theme. You can see example of result here > http://themes.goodlayers2.com/flawless/blog-full-with-right-sidebar/

item.title: Master Slider
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Master Slider

Master Slider is a premium image and content slider with super smooth hardware accelerated transitions. It supports touch navigation with pure swipe gesture that you have never experienced before. It’s a truly responsive and device friendly slider which works perfect in all major devices.

item.title: Optimized Code & SEO
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Optimized Code & SEO

We reconstructed about how to use title. We use heading tag(H1,H2,H3,…) for title which is good practice for search engine site. Main contents are moved above sidebars(including both sidebar layout), now search engine will easily fine your main contents first. Also, ‘alt’ tag for images is supported. This is also help search engine to analyst your site easily.

item.title: Scalable Container
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
Scalable Container

If you like 960px, 1280px, 1400px.... It's all good. You can put ANY number in this box.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Visual Editor in Page Builder
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded:
No More Waiting!

Many customers used to ask us to add visual editor in page builder and here you are. We added this awesome feature in our new page builder framework!

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: gdadmin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
